import PropTypes from '../../components/PropTypes';
import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Link } from 'fannypack/Link/Link';

# Link

```jsx
import { Link } from 'fannypack'
```

`<Link>` renders a `<a>` element with reset styles and basic link styling.

```jsx-live
<Link href="https://google.com">Click me</Link>
```

## Link Props

<!-- Automatically generated -->

**`overrides`**

```
{ base?: any; hover?: any; focus?: any; }
```

```
string

```
```
string
```

</details>
        

## Theming

<Theme component={Link} overrides={['Link.base', 'Link.hover', 'Link.focus']}>Hello world</Theme>
